author: Todd Feathers, Janus Rose, Jason Koebler
title: Definitely Don’t Download The FBI’s Fitness App During Quarantine
description: With millions isolating at home, the Bureau has been pushing a suspicious app that accesses to your phone's location and other sensitive data.
content:
Its important to stay physically active during a COVID-19 quarantine, and your neighborhood FBI office has a suggestion.
 Over the past few days, dozens of regional FBI offices have tweeted the same message about the FBI Fit Test app: Looking for a new fitne… [+1945 chars]
